news_header: Several international companies, including Accenture, Meta, and Amazon, have discontinued their diversity, equity, and inclusion (DEI) programs. A news agency is seeking experiences from individuals regarding similar changes at their workplaces for a story, ensuring personal data will be handled by Yle's journalists only with permission.
news_original_title: Onko teidän yrityksessänne karsittu monimuotoisuus­ohjelmia? Kerro Ylelle, teemme juttua
